sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这家店的商品质量很好。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè jiā diàn de shāngpǐn zhìliàng hěn hǎo.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La qualité des produits de ce magasin est très bonne.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The quality of products in this store is very good.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ de mùbiāo shì xuéhǎo Zhōngwén.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Mon objectif est de bien apprendre le chinois.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: My goal is to learn Chinese well.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Liǎng jiā gōngsī juédìng liánhé.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les deux entreprises ont décidé de s'unir.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The two companies decided to unite.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè zhǒng xíngshì de kǎoshì hěn nán.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce type d'examen est très difficile.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This form of exam is very difficult.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè jiàn shì yǒu zhòngdà yìyì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette affaire a une grande signification.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This matter has great significance.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhèxiē shūcài hěn xīnxiān.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ces légumes sont très frais.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: These vegetables are very fresh.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ duì yīnyuè hěn yǒu xìngqù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je m'intéresse beaucoup à la musique.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I'm very interested in music.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè shì yī gè shāngyè qū.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est un quartier commercial.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is a commercial district.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nǐ yǒu shénme lǐyóu zhèyàng zuò?
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Quelle raison as-tu de faire cela ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: What reason do you have for doing this?

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā dǎpò le shìjiè jìlù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a battu le record du monde.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He broke the world record.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā xiàdìng juéxīn yào chénggōng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il est déterminé à réussir.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is determined to succeed.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ xūyào dài yǎnjìng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'ai besoin de porter des lunettes.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I need to wear glasses.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这个东西要多少人民币？
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhège dōngxi yào duōshao Rénmínbì?
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Combien de yuan chinois coûte cet article ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: How many RMB does this cost?

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Hé biān yǒu hěn duō shítou.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il y a beaucoup de pierres au bord de la rivière.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: There are many stones by the river.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè jiā gōngchǎng zhìzào qìchē.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette usine fabrique des voitures.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This factory manufactures cars.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè zhāng zhuōzi shì mùtou zuò de.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette table est faite en bois.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This table is made of wood.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ shǔ hóu.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je suis du signe du singe.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I was born in the year of the monkey.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我今天遇到了一个老朋友。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ jīntiān yùdào le yī gè lǎo péngyou.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'ai rencontré un vieil ami aujourd'hui.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I met an old friend today.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng shūrù nǐ de mìmǎ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez entrer votre mot de passe.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please enter your password.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā zài zhuīgǎn gōnggòng qìchē.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il court après le bus.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is chasing the bus.
